mapper.select: SELECT id, brand, model, year, color, mileage, license_number, category_id, customer_id FROM vehicle
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vehicle (id, brand, model, year, color, mileage, license_number, category_id, customer_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{brand}, #{model}, #{year}, #{color}, #{mileage}, #{licenseNumber}, #{categoryId}, #{customerId})
mapper.update: UPDATE vehicle SET brand = #{brand}, model = #{model}, year = #{year}, color = #{color}, mileage = #{mileage}, license_number = #{licenseNumber}, category_id = #{categoryId}, customer_id = #{customerId} WHERE id = #{id}
